channel.title: Runescape Forum, What you think of the style?
channel.description:
Hey, I normally chill in the RSC section but I have been working on a Runescape Forum. I was just wondering what you guys think of the style. I want honest feedback. :)
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/35/runescapeforum.png/][IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/9898/runescapeforum.th.png[/img][/URL]
Click the thumbnail to see a bigger picture.

item.title: Runescape Forum, What you think of the style?
item.dc:creator: @Pompano21 Pompano21
item.description:
@Pompano21 wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:22, topic:412785”][quote author=Pompano21 link=topic=514261.msg3734215#msg3734215 date=1314824576]
Added awards which will show in your posts. For skill totals or just general forum awards.


[/quote]

nice rofl[/quote]

Thanks,

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape Forum, What you think of the style?

item.title: Runescape Forum, What you think of the style?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:10, topic:412785”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=514261.msg3733121#msg3733121 date=1314737076]
You will end up getting copyrighted for their images won’t you?
[/quote]

You know to copyright something costs about $5000, right?[/quote]
To copyright a major label like coke does for it’s advertisements yes, but to copyright small images and such like RuneScape uses is like $10. I copyrighted a whole book last year for $50.

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape Forum, What you think of the style?

item.title: Runescape Forum, What you think of the style?
item.dc:creator: @Pompano21 Pompano21
item.description:
@Pompano21 wrote:

[quote=“i have an ax, post:18, topic:412785”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=514261.msg3733417#msg3733417 date=1314749000]

Those icons that represent ‘New Posts’ and ‘Old Posts’ doesn’t seem to match the theme and the rest of the forum.

divine for new posts spirit shield for old posts, they’re both rs related, so what are you saying exactly?

Exactly what I said in my post mate, it doesn’t match the theme well.

it’s rs related …
[/quote]So what if its RuneScape related it still dose not match the theme.[/quote]

The theme is RuneScape. Derp.
[/quote]

Yeah but he is saying that even though my site is Runescape related the current icons I have do not match my theme.

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape Forum, What you think of the style?

item.title: Runescape Forum, What you think of the style?
item.dc:creator: @Pompano21 Pompano21
item.description:
@Pompano21 wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

Those icons that represent ‘New Posts’ and ‘Old Posts’ doesn’t seem to match the theme and the rest of the forum.

Do you have any suggestions for alternatives that will look better? Trying to get as many ideas as I can.

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape Forum, What you think of the style?

item.title: Runescape Forum, What you think of the style?
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:8, topic:412785”][quote author=Pompano21 link=topic=514261.msg3733101#msg3733101 date=1314736456]

Nice forumotion based website.

Forumotion based? What is that?

This is Mybb

Btw we have a new mascot lolol.


[/quote]

/fp, mybb is forumotion based.[/quote]Kid leave now you have no idea what your talking about mybb is a type of forum and just because some shitty free host called forumotion is hosting it on there site dose not mean they own it

[quote=“judostar1, post:10, topic:412785”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=514261.msg3733121#msg3733121 date=1314737076]
You will end up getting copyrighted for their images won’t you?
[/quote]

You know to copyright something costs about $5000, right?[/quote]
Once again your an idiot hes not going to copyright those images seeing as jagex already owns them. He will probably get some kind of copyright infringement notice which could escalate to a lawsuit if not handled properly

[quote=“judostar1, post:15, topic:412785”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=514261.msg3733365#msg3733365 date=1314747221]

Those icons that represent ‘New Posts’ and ‘Old Posts’ doesn’t seem to match the theme and the rest of the forum.

divine for new posts spirit shield for old posts, they’re both rs related, so what are you saying exactly?

Exactly what I said in my post mate, it doesn’t match the theme well.
[/quote]

it’s rs related …[/quote]So what if its RuneScape related it still dose not match the theme.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Pompano21 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:3, topic:412785”]I really like the idea

But ye, keep the advertising to your signature, you posted a picture[/quote]

Sorry buddy, I did not mean it in an advertisement sense. Just wanted people to see the actual website live. We still need to change tons of buttons.

Thanks, do you have any feedback on what I should change or add?

Read full topic
